alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:50PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pike and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norman, or 10 miles south of Mount Ida, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Norman... Daisy... Daisy State Park... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Black Springs... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Salem in Pike County... Lodi... Langley... Fancyhill... Hopper... Caddo Gap... Kirby... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
